original_text: And he took butter, and milk, and the calf which he had dressed, and set it before them; and he stood by them under the tree, and they did eat.
korean_text: 아브라함이 엉긴 젖과 우유와 하인이 요리한 송아지를 가져다가 그들 앞에 차려 놓고 나무 아래에 모셔 서매 그들이 먹으니라

sentences.original_text: And he took butter, and milk
and the calf which he had dressed
and he stood by them under the tree
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 나무 아래에서 그들 곁에 서 있었더라
